description:
Aya`s mother only appears on photographs (in her family`s home, and during her funeral) but has several spoken lines (in flashback scenes of her http://anidb.net/ch9747 [daughter]).
She died in a car accident but only when she mysteriously returned to life on the next day (and nobody considered this strange) Aya`s reality began to crumble.
name: Aya no Haha
